condition.narrative: Project Implemention Manual | Description :A Project Implementation Manual shall be prepared, in accordance with terms of referenceacceptable to the Bank containing detailed implementation, administrative, fiduciary, and monitoring and evaluation procedures andarrangements for the Project. | Due Date :01-Mar-2016
